txt.en: You have reached the First Hall, the eastern threshold of Moria. Svanr wishes to speak with you now.
You must return to the eastern threshold to speak with Svanr
It is time to make for the East Gate of Moria, at long last.

'I am rested, and I see that you are eager to get moving. Shall we make our final journey together, [placeholder]?\n\n'I was told by many that the dwarves hold the First Hall. I hope this means that the remainder of our trip will not be too difficult.'
The Summoning Horn can be found near Svanr at his small camp in northern Nud-melek.\n\nYou should use the Summoning Horn to call Svanr when you are ready to depart.
'From Durin's Threshold to the First Hall, and Great Delving to Nud-melek. Think of all the halls we wandered to make it so far. Well, here we are! Let us put up our feet.'
The First Hall can be found at the eastern-most gate of Nud-melek. Svanr can be summoned using the horn he gave you.\n\nYou should head east with Svanr to finish your pilgrimage through Moria.
The First Hall can be found at the eastern-most gate of Nud-melek.\n\nYou should head east with Svanr to finish your pilgrimage through Moria.

'We made it! At last, we will smell the clean air again, and feel the sun upon our faces.\n\n'I am mighty glad we defeated the Orc-parties making their way eastward. I thought this camp would be better defended, but I do not think these dwarves could withstand a push from Mazog's Orcs.'
Use the Summoning Horn to call Svanr to your side
Talk to Svanr once you reach the First Hall (summon him using the horn he gave you)
Talk to Svanr at the First Hall
